name: lopunnite
effect: Held: Allows Lopunny to Mega Evolve into Mega Lopunny.
short_effect: Held: Allows Lopunny to Mega Evolve into Mega Lopunny.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Lopunny hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.

to Mega Evolve during battle.
